subject: [R] Howto fix colors in colorRampPalette?
body:
Hi All,

I am plotting a correlation matrix using the heatmap function. I create my
color palette as follows (say, for red-green palette):
colorRampPalette( c("green", "black", "red"), space="rgb")(10)

But I want to fix colors for a specific range of values, i.e. green=-1,
black=0, red=+1. The purpose of doing this is I can then quickly compare two
different correlation matrices visually, i.e., one matrix has values in the
range -1 to +1, whereas the other has from -0.5 to +0.5. Then the two
heatmaps differ in color levels. I searched in the help archives to find any
hints but didn't. Is there an easy way of doing this?
Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thanks.
Ashoka.
